cleaned_text: All of us will take medicine at some time in our lives. It is important to talk with your doctor about how your medicine could affect your plans to get (or not) get pregnant. Some of the medicine choices you and your doctor make while youare not pregnant can be different from the choices you make when you are pregnant.
